pages.title: Brazier
pages.text: With a <item>Brazier/$, many different things can be done. An item can be added or removed with a right click, or automation.$(br2)Adding some water with a bucket makes it safe to land on the <item>brazier/$ from a high height, and makes it extinguish you if you stand on it.$(br2)

Adding lava instead makes it set things on it on fire, so it can be used as a trash can for items that won't set the area on fire.$(br2)A coal block makes it burn, letting off light, without consuming the coal.$(br2)Similarly, a glowstone block also makes it glow at light level 15.$(br2)
Soul sand prevents the spawning of witches and endermen teleportation in a large area (default 32 block radius). This is useful for mob farms.$(br2)
